long_description: The streamlined Arc'teryx Beta AR Jacket provides the backcountry minimalist with durable storm protection in a lightweight and packable format. Gore-Tex Pro Shell three-layer laminate fabric is waterproof, snow-shedding, windproof, breathable, lightweight and durable. Taped seams add weatherproofness; durable water repellent finish helps bead water from fabric surface. Micro-seam allowance (1.6 mm) reduces bulk and weight. Generous cut for easy layering; one-hand adjustable drawcords. Anatomical shaping for fit and comfort. Articulated patterning and elbows for unrestricted mobility; no-lift gusseted underarms. Helmet compatible DropHood(TM) with laminated brim. Chin guard with brushed microsuede. WaterTight(TM) external zippers; laminated pit zippers; corded zipper-pulls; WaterTight Vislon front zip; zipper garages. Die-cut rip-and-stick cuff adjusters reduce bulk, and won't catch or tear off. Adjustable elastic waist drawcord; adjustable hem drawcord; laminated hem; drop back hem. Internal chest pocket with laminated zip; 2 high-volume hand pockets with WaterTight zippers. Reinforced shoulders and arms. Note: WaterTight(TM) zippers are highly water resistant, but not waterproof.
